channel.title: Help me, i downloaded instant msn names, every convo this happens:
channel.description: okay, everytime i start a convo box i always automatically say: get your instand messenger names, the company says that if i delete program through add/remove prgrms it will goi, i did and it hasnt.. any ideas?
